page_description: Our bi-directional dampers, which revolutionize heavy-duty transportation in the construction and mining sectors, set new standards in durability and efficiency. We offer the reliability and performance you need.
gen_li_2: Other dimensions are available on standard valve according to low-cost simple modulation working principle
tech_pressure_description: 50kPa (0.5 bar) as standard but can also design for higher values on request.
tech_heat_description: 60°C (m/s 2.2) as standard, but we can design up to 120°C (m/s2.2) F on request.
banner_description: Fortek 2-Way Dampers provide simple and cost-effective control and isolation management. Various sealing systems, including special alloy springs and an air fan, can be used to ensure the correct sealing efficiency required for your application.
